narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Addiction Recovery Care LLC is a Substance Abuse Rehabilitation Facility provider based in Owingsville, KY. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $24.7M in Medicaid payments across 105K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $24.7M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
